# bsvars

Bayesian Estimation of Structural Vector Autoregressive Models

## Installation

Installation from a private repository requires an authentication token and installed package **devtools**. In April 2022, the download code is:
```r
devtools::install_git("https://gitlab+deploy-token-957505:pGGxsq_NrnAxeh8yt4wV@gitlab.com/tomaszwozniak/bsvars.git")
```
